LanguageData.SL_RaidOriginLeaderInfo: Base Leader {PAWN_nameDef} decided to join this raid, if you can capture or kill them - all future raids from this base will be weakened.
LanguageData.SL_SiteOwnershipInfo: Base '{0}' has claimed ownership of this site.
LanguageData.SL_JumpToBaseDesc: Jump to the base that owns this site.
LanguageData.SL_ActingLeaderChosen: The acting {FACTION_leaderTitle} is {PAWN_nameDef} until a new leader is chosen.
LanguageData.SL_PowerVoidEndedLetterLabel: {FACTION_name} has come out of a Power Void.
LanguageData.SL_NewLeaderElectedLetterBody: {PAWN_nameDef} has been selected as the new faction leader.
